title: ISic001278. Fragment of a verse epigram? (lost)
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΜΑΡΚΙΑΝΟΣ[---]
2[---]ΑΜΕΝΟΣΤΗΣ[---]
3[---]ΣΤΙΟΙΣΑΝΕΛΕ[---]
4[---]ΚΑΤΕΡΧΟΙ[---]
5[---]ΜΕ[---]ΙΕΡΟΝΕΙ[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Carrera. Kaibel refrains from attempting to restore;
  • 2: Carrera: ΑΜΕΝΟSΤΗΣ
  • 4: Carrera: ΚΑΤΕRΧΟΙ
  • 5: Carrera: ΙΕRΟΝΕΙ

translation

commentary

As Kaibel observes, this is almost certainly a verse epigram of some sort; presumably of the later Roman period, perhaps third or fourth century CE. All editions derive directly or indirectly from Carrera.

bibliography

  • Carrera 1639 288 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002755

  • Castelli 1784 282 c.18 no.15 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083
  • Ferrara 1829 384 nο. 12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002005
  • 14.0454 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 3.5649g https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
